description_0: An eye-level view of a bathroom with a white hexagonal tile floor with black tiles forming circles patterned throughout the floor. The bottom halves of the walls in the restroom are teal square tiles, the top halves are gray dry walls. There is a white porcelain sink attached to the wall held up by two metal posts. Under the sink is a white stepping stool. There is a white porcelain toilet behind the sink in the corner of the bathroom. There is a gray shower rug on the right side of the floor. There are white door frames extending vertically in the foreground on the left and right side of the image. There is a white door attached to the left door frame. There is a window in the top half of the furthest wall. There are lamps visible on the wall near the top left corner of the image.
description_1: An indoor frontal view of a closed white porcelain toilet on a brown tile floor in a bathroom indention between yellow textured walls. There are two chrome toilet paper holders holding two rolls of toilet paper to the left of the toilet. A white towel is folded in place across the tank of the toilet, with a small white rectangle placed in the center. A black oval-shaped trash bin sits to the back right of the toilet with a clear plastic trash bag. A square picture frame is mounted above the toilet, reflecting a bright white light. A chrome faucet and white porcelain bathtub are visible to the far left.
